body:
Hi all,

First of all, thank you for an amazing software.

I am running into some problems with the SelectSkyMTX component. See attached figure. 

I tried manually doawnloading the gendaymtx.exe and putting it in the c:/ladybug as you suggested here: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/gencumulati...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/gencumulativeskymtx-error)

but that didn't make any difference for me. Any ideas of what might be causing this problem for me? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Ugvao0mAfe5hJQ4e60MFwLqf8HkIaXIOP5W8c8Y*hsd2vvk50OUNx9bKwJEKSakLWqgCOeD5JR8oBTrSk64wJBYbj7p2rOUS/getskymtx.png)
